author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: You're even cooler, just not as noticeable. I'd do a lot to be as smart (and creative) as you are. And people tell *me* that a lot.
body_html: You're even cooler, just not as noticeable. I'd do a lot to be as smart (and creative) as you are. And people tell me that a lot.
